intro: Zain Solutions operates through two specialized Business Units:

modelProvides.title: Flexible scalability based on project requirements

unitDescription: Zain Infra is responsible for designing, building, and operating secure, resilient, and scalable technology foundations that support daily enterprise operations.

services.title: IT Infrastructure
services.text: Enterprise networking, data centers, cloud readiness

services.title: Cybersecurity & Physical Security
services.text: Network/system security, surveillance and access control, compliance support

valueDelivered: Reliable and secure foundations that enable successful digital transformation initiatives.

unitTitle: Digital Transformation & Intelligent Solutions Business Unit
unitDescription: Zain DX drives digital innovation, enabling organizations to move from traditional operating models to intelligent, automated, and data-driven enterprises.

services.title: Digital Transformation & Automation
services.text: Process analysis, workflow automation, RPA, AI solutions

services.title: Management Information Systems (MIS)
services.text: Enterprise systems, reporting & alerts, governance support

services.title: Data Analytics & Business Intelligence
services.text: Dashboards, KPIs, predictive and prescriptive analytics

services.title: Digital & Strategic Consulting
services.text: Transformation roadmaps, process optimization, program/project governance

services.title: Platforms & Applications
services.text: Enterprise web platforms, intelligent applications, tailored digital solutions

valueDelivered: Improved efficiency, smarter decision-making, and accelerated digital maturity.

integratedApproach.title: Integrated Delivery Approach
integratedApproach.description: Zain Solutions ensures seamless integration between Zain Infra and Zain DX so that every engagement:
points: Starts with a secure and resilient foundation
Operates under unified governance and accountability
It is enhanced with automation, analytics, and intelligence
Evolves continuously to maximize long-term value
integratedApproach.conclusion: Clients engage with one company and receive a fully integrated solution.
